Author: Kirrana
Name: High FPS Physics Fix
Punchline: Causes physics to work well enough above even 120fps by making it update every second frame. May cause excessive jiggling at lower FPS values.
Description:
Causes physics to work well enough above even 120fps by making it update every second frame. 
Toggle with /physics. 
May cause excessive jiggling at lower FPS values. 
Disabling the entire plugin after turning on/off with /physics requires reboot to reenable.
